Document: #Survivor Roleplay Standards - Survivors have more leeway than marines with mental stability due to trauma experienced during the xenonid attack. They may be suffering PTSD, paranoia or similar conditions for roleplaying purposes. - [bold]Survivors should not be rushing to attack the hive before the roundstart xenos have had a chance to evolve (5 minutes).[/bold] - Standard survivors are not hostile to the Marines. - If there is an exception due to faction it will be clear. - Hostile Faction Survivors cannot attempt to harm other survivors. - [bold]Hunting or Securing Monkeys to deny Xenonid captures is considered Powergaming.[/bold]
